text:
praya#ndhi || 
praqdAqtAra(gm)# havAmahaq indraqmA haqviShA# vaqyaM | 
uqBA hi hastAq vasu#nA pRuqNasvA &&praya#cCaq dakShi#NAqdOta saqvyAt || 
praqdAqtA vaqjrI vRu#ShaqBastu#rAqShATCuqShmI rAjA# vRutraqhA sO#maqpA vA$ | 
aqsmin yaqj~jE baqrq.hiShyA niqShadyAthA# Bavaq yaja#mAnAyaq SaM ~MyOH ||
indra#H suqtrAmAq svavAq(gm)q avO#BiH sumRuDIqkO Ba#vatu viqSvavE#dAH | 
bAdha#tAqM dvEShOq aBa#yaM kRuNOtu suqvIrya#syaq - [  ] 50
